traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The mastodon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Trampling Charge
traits.desc: If the mastodon moves at least 20 feet straight towards a creature and then hits with a gore attack on the same turn, that creature must succeed on a DC 19 Strength check or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the mastodon can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (4d8 + 9) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 48 (6d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the mammoth’s next turn.
